attributes.action: Abolish hospital car parking fees for patients.
attributes.additional_details: With current waiting times it is impossible for patients to determine how much money they need to feed the parking machine, they could be waiting to bee seen for hours. Research has shown that none of the money from hospital car parks is in any proportion given back to the hospital or the NHS. Please support this petition.
attributes.background: Patients attending hospital for their appointments should not have to pay for parking. This should also be free for hospital staff.
